alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 12:46AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Fairfield, northwestern New Haven, north central Westchester and eastern Putnam Counties through 130 AM EDT... At 1245 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Brookfield to near Brewster. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Waterbury, Danbury, Naugatuck, Southbury, Wolcott, Sherman, Brewster, Newtown, Ridgefield, Monroe, Bethel, Brookfield, New Fairfield, Redding and Middlebury. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
